item.title: Beyoncé and Jay-Z to Compete Against Each Other for an Emmy This Year
item.description: The husband and wife superstars were both nominees in the outstanding variety special (live) category, while other high profile artists getting nominations Tuesday included Kendrick Lamar and Questlov

item.description: The husband and wife superstars were both nominees in the outstanding variety special (live) category, while other high profile artists getting nominations Tuesday included Kendrick Lamar and Questlov

item.title: Iggy Pop on Closing Out ‘Superman’ Soundtrack: Hero is “the Best Friend You Could Have”
item.description: “Punkrocker,” Iggy Pop’s collaboration with Teddybears, underscores the blockbuster’s emotional final scene — and has seen streaming gains as a result.

item.title: Iggy Pop on Closing Out ‘Superman’ Soundtrack: Hero is “the Best Friend You Could Have”
item.description: “Punkrocker,” Iggy Pop’s collaboration with Teddybears, underscores the blockbuster’s emotional final scene — and has seen streaming gains as a result.

item.title: Primary Wave Acquires Rights from Estate of Fleetwood Mac’s Peter Green
item.description: When I look at the definition of a musical genius, Peter Green ticks every box," Primary Wave’s Robin Godfrey Cass said.

item.description: The sequel to the 1984 cult classic ‘This Is Spinal Tap’ hits theaters in September.

item.title: Unreleased Beyoncé Music Stolen From Rental Car Ahead of Cowboy Carter Tour Atlanta Stops
item.description: A suspect stole “water marked music, some unreleased music, footage plans for the show and past and future set lists,” according to an Atlanta Police incident report.

item.description: A suspect stole “water marked music, some unreleased music, footage plans for the show and past and future set lists,” according to an Atlanta Police incident report.

item.description: The four-member supergroup brought their Deadline world tour to L.A.’s SoFi Stadium with two sold-out shows over the weekend, with the tour serving as a reunion of sorts after successful solo endeavor

item.title: Tears, Spaceships and Nostalgia: How Backstreet Boys “Pushed the Limits” of Las Vegas’ Sphere With “Mind-Boggling” Residency Launch
item.description: The group launched their Into the Millennium shows with a slew of emotions: “I started breaking down and crying because it was so emotional and surreal.”

item.description: The group launched their Into the Millennium shows with a slew of emotions: “I started breaking down and crying because it was so emotional and surreal.”

item.title: Kanye “Ye” West Struggles Through Chaotic, Rain-Soaked Shanghai Concert
item.description: Attendees at the July 12 gig at the Shanghai Stadium were chanting for a refund after Ye appeared over 40 minutes late and the event was mired with technical problems and poor weather.

item.title: Kanye “Ye” West Struggles Through Chaotic, Rain-Soaked Shanghai Concert
item.description: Attendees at the July 12 gig at the Shanghai Stadium were chanting for a refund after Ye appeared over 40 minutes late and the event was mired with technical problems and poor weather.

item.title: Justin Bieber’s ‘Swag’: A Track-by-Track Breakdown
item.description: R&Bieber is back for his first album in four years: a 21-track collection that’s both earnest and doesn’t take itself too seriously.

item.title: Travis Scott Reveals Sunday Release Date for ‘Jackboys 2’
item.description: “The Jack is back with 17 tracks full of trunk rattling classics in the making,” reads the album promo art Scott shared Thursday night.
